lead_paragraph: Inside the Cape Town home studio of Danielle Clough, whose modern take on an old-school craft has captured the attention of Vans and the United Nations.

headline.main: Vivid, Artful Embroidery — on Unusual Surfaces

snippet: Inside the Cape Town home studio of Danielle Clough, whose modern take on an old-school craft has captured the attention of Vans and the United Nations.
abstract: Sketch artist Danielle Clough specializes in embroidery, making patterns that cling to racket strings and that often depict nature themes.
